sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import {Form,Col,Button,Accordion,Card} from 'react-bootstrap' import './Prenota.css' import {Redirect} from "react-router-dom"; class Prenota extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { dati_casa: this.props.history.location.state ? this.props.history.location.state.dati_casa : [], checkIn: this.props.history.location.state? this.props.history.location.state.checkIn : '', checkOut: this.props.history.location.state ? this.props.history.location.state.checkOut : '', posti: this.props.history.location.state ? this.props.history.location.state.posti : 1, numPosti: [], partenza: '', ritorno: '', pagamento: '', cf: '', nome: '', cognome: '', nascita: '', apiRespone: [], error: false, errorMessage: '', success: false, incomplete: false } } componentDidMount() { if(this.state.checkIn !== '' && this.state.checkOut !== '') { var str1 = this.state.checkIn; var dmy1 = str1.split("/"); var date1 = new Date(dmy1[2], dmy1[1] - 1, dmy1[0]); var offset1 = date1.getTimezoneOffset(); date1 = new Date(date1.getTime() - (offset1*60*1000)); var str2 = this.state.checkOut; var dmy2 = str2.split("/"); var date2 = new Date(dmy2[2], dmy2[1] - 1, dmy2[0]); var offset2 = date2.getTimezoneOffset(); date2 = new Date(date2.getTime() - (offset2*60*1000)); this.setState({ partenza: date1.toISOString().slice(0,10), ritorno: date2.toISOString().slice(0,10) }); } var array = []; for(var i = 0; i < this.state.dati_casa.posti; i++) { array[i] = i; array[i]++; } this.setState({ numPosti: array }); } onChange = (e) => { this.setState({ [e.target.id]: e.target.value }) } onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if(this.state.pagamento === '') { this.setState({ incomplete: true }); return; } } render(){ if(!localStorage.getItem('logged')) { return } return(

"Casa vacanza" : "B&B"}   {this.state.dati_casa.nome_proprieta},  {this.state.dati_casa.localita} ({this.state.dati_casa.provincia}) Periodo {this.state.checkIn} - {this.state.checkOut} Numero di ospiti {this.state.posti} {this.state.posti === 1 ? "persona" : "persone"} Costo alloggio €{this.state.dati_casa.costo} Costo tassa di soggiorno €3 per ogni soggiornante
); } } export default Prenota;
